title.rendered: London is decked out for Charles’s debut

content.rendered:
The official coronation of the British King Charles III. For this, a royal event is being held in London, UK on May 6. Heads of state and government of different countries of the world, members of the royal family are gathering in London to participate in the event. The whole of London, including Buckingham Palace, is decorated around the coronation of Charles.

The lighting is arranged in the pattern of a royal crown. London’s Hyde Park

The streets of London’s Picdolly Circus area are decorated with national flags The square is decorated with the national flag. An artist is showing that with the touch of paint
Curtains installed at Buckingham Palace. A visitor gallery has been created. People present there will be able to directly watch the royal ceremony of the coronation of King Charles
